description: Try our easy to follow Smoky Black Bean & Corn Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Winter,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Dairy free
name: Smoky Black Bean & Corn Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook for 4 minutes or until tender. Add corn, beans, sauce, stock and 2 cups water. Bring mixture to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine tomato, avocado and lime juice in a bowl. Ladle soup into bowls. Top with salsa and coriander leaves. Serve with tortilla chips.
